statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Norfolk run nets win over Saint Peter's, 60-58
article.headline: Norfolk run nets win over Saint Peter's, 60-58
article.linkText: Norfolk run nets win over Saint Peter's, 60-58
article.story: JERSEY CITY, N.J. -- Jeffrey Short tossed in 20 points and RaShid Gaston and D'Shon Taylor each added 14 as Norfolk State held off Saint Peter's 60-58 in the Saint Peter's Division of the Barclays Center Classic Saturday night. Saint Peter's took a 27-20 lead at halftime behind 6 of 11 shooting from three-point range. Marvin Dominique led the first-half charge with 10 points with a pair of 3-pointers. The Spartans (4-3) trailed by 14 four minutes into the second half after Travis Hester drilled a 3 for Saint Peter's. Short and Taylor hit back-to-back 3s to jump start Norfolk's second-half offense, with Taylor scoring nine straight points for the Spartans. Short's layup with 3:04 left gave Norfolk the lead for the first time in the half during a 17-0 run to take over the game. Dominique finished with 17 points to lead Saint Peter's. Tyler Gaskins and Hester each added 12 points.
